Itâ€™s been an amazing couple of weeks for our west coast urban dance community with Vibe and Urban Paradise. I really just want to give out some love and thanks to everyone that I crossed paths with at these events. Thanks and respect to all of the crews/performers that shared their artistry...you leave me inspired. Thanks to all of the supporters and fans that purchased tickets to give us all a reason to perform and push ourselves. Thanks to those in the shadows that put in the work to organize and produce these shows. Considering the fact that UP had 2 shows this year I (and Charles Nguyen) sometimes found myself introducing a team or performer 3 times! I hope I did right by you all and thanks for allowing me to play a small part in your journey. Until the next time we see each other on the stage. âœŒï¸-Ant
